metadata.title: CVE-2023-0996 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a vulnerability in the strided image data parsing code in theemscripten wrapper for libheif. An attacker could exploit this through acrafted image file to cause a buffer overflow in linear memory during amemcpy call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0996` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

heif-gdk-pixbuf - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
heif-thumbnailer - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-examples - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-plugin-aomdec - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-plugin-aomenc - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-plugin-dav1d - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-plugin-libde265 - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-plugin-rav1e - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-plugin-svtenc - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif-plugin-x265 - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
libheif1 - 1.16.2-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libheif package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.16.2-2ubuntu1').
